<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.9.1
<SEQUENCE>17
<FILENAME>dex491.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Second Supplemental Indenture</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 4.9.1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR
SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.625% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2016
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 14, 2005 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%"
SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of November&nbsp;14, 2005, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;19 2005, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>),
pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.625% Senior Notes due 2016 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect:
(a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy
Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of Chesapeake Permian
Acquisition, L.L.C. (&#147;Permian&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company as a Subsidiary Guarantor; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things
prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Second Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument
legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective
Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Second Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for
any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 1 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Second Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its
execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Second Supplemental Indenture,
Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C., all Delaware limited liability companies, and Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., an Oklahoma limited liability company are subject to
the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of Permian with and into Chesapeake Permian, L.P., an Oklahoma limited partnership
(&#147;CPLP&#148;), which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, Permian shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from all of its Guarantees and related obligations in the
Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of Permian; and the signature of an Officer of Permian. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with Permian and a Subsidiary Guarantor, CPLP hereby agrees to assume all of the
obligations of Permian. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in
accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Second
Supplemental Indenture. This Second Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at
length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee
that Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that
term is defined in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND
ENFORCE THIS SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Second Supplemental
Indenture. Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE
IS SIGNATURE PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Second Supplemental Indenture to be duly
executed, all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px;border-bottom:1px solid #000000"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">/s/ Aubrey K. McClendon</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Aubrey K. McClendon</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Chief Executive Officer of the Company and of the Subsidiaries listed below:</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Corporate Subsidiaries:</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE EAGLE CANADA CORP.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY LOUISIANA CORPORATION</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE PRH CORP.</FONT></TD></TR>

<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE OPERATING, INC.,</FONT></TD></TR>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">On behalf of itself and, as general partner, the following limited partnerships:</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE EXPLORATION LIMITED PARTNERSHIP</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE LOUISIANA, L.P.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>

<TR>

<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.9.2
<SEQUENCE>18
<FILENAME>dex492.htm
<DESCRIPTION>THIRD SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Third Supplemental Indenture</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 4.9.2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR
SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.625% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2016
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIRD SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 24, 2006 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%"
SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS THIRD SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;24, 2006, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;19, 2005, as supplemented prior to the date hereof (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>),
pursuant to which the Company has originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.625% Senior Notes due 2016 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect:
(a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Hodges Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100
Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc. as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of Chesapeake PRH Corp. (&#147;PRH&#148;), a Texas corporation, Chesapeake ENO
Acquisition, L.L.C. (&#147;ENO&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, Chesapeake EP, L.L.C. (&#147;EP&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, John C. Oxley, L.L.C. (&#147;Oxley&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, Columbia
Natural Resources, L.L.C. (&#147;CNR&#148;), a Delaware limited liability company, Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C. (&#147;CER&#148;), a Delaware limited liability company, Chesapeake NFW, L.P. (&#147;NFW&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership,
Chesapeake Permian, L.P. (&#147;Permian&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership, Chesapeake-Staghorn Acquisition, L.P. (&#147;Staghorn&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership and Chesapeake Zapata, L.P. (&#147;Zapata&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited
Partnership; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent
documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this Third Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its
terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above
premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 1 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Third Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for
any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Third Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its execution
and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Third Supplemental Indenture,
Hodges Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100 Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc., all Oklahoma corporations, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in
Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata, with and into Chesapeake Exploration Limited Partnership, an Oklahoma limited partnership (&#147;CELP&#148;), which
constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata shall for all purposes be released as Subsidiary Guarantors from all of their Guarantees and related
obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the names of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata, the signature of an
Officer of each of PRH, ENO, EP and Oxley and the signature of an Officer of Chesapeake Operating, Inc. on behalf of NFW, Permian and Zapata. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata and a Subsidiary Guarantor, CELP hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and
Zapata. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.03. </I>As a result of the merger of CNR and CER, with and into Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., an Oklahoma
limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, CNR and CER shall for all purposes be released as Subsidiary Guarantors from all of their Guarantees and related
obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the names of CNR and CER, the signature of an Officer of CNR and the signature of an
Officer of CER. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.04. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with CER and CNR and a Subsidiary Guarantor, Chesapeake
Appalachia, L.L.C. hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of CNR and CER. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.05. </I>As a result of the dissolution of Staghorn, the Company has taken all actions
required to effect the release, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture, of Staghorn as a Subsidiary Guarantor. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of Staghorn and the signature of an
Officer of Staghorn on its behalf. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in
accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Third Supplemental
Indenture. This Third Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein
and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Hodges
Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100 Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc. have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the Indenture).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS THIRD SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Third Supplemental Indenture. Each signed copy
shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE IS SIGNATURE PAGE]
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Third Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px;border-bottom:1px solid #000000"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">/s/ Aubrey K. McClendon</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Aubrey K. McClendon</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Chief Executive Officer of the Company and of the Subsidiaries listed below:</B></FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Corporate Subsidiaries:</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE EAGLE CANADA CORP.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY LOUISIANA CORPORATION</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE SOUTH TEXAS CORP.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOMAC DRILLING CORPORATION</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">OXLEY PETROLEUM CO.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">HODGES HOLDING COMPANY, INC.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">HODGES OILFIELD COMPANY</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">HODGES TRUCKING COMPANY</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOMAC 100 CORP.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">W.W. REALTY, INC.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.10.1
<SEQUENCE>19
<FILENAME>dex4101.htm
<DESCRIPTION>FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>First Supplemental Indenture</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 4.10.1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR
SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2018
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 14, 2005 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%"
SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of November&nbsp;14, 2005, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of June&nbsp;20 2005, (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has
originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.25% Senior Notes due 2018 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS,
Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect: (a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary
Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. as Restricted Subsidiaries of
the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions
required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of Chesapeake Permian Acquisition, L.L.C. (&#147;Permian&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company as a Subsidiary Guarantor; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company,
of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this First Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and
performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the
Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This First Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall
be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 1 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This First Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its
execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this First Supplemental Indenture,
Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C., all Delaware limited liability companies, and Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., an Oklahoma limited liability company are subject to
the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of Permian with and into Chesapeake Permian, L.P., an Oklahoma limited partnership
(&#147;CPLP&#148;), which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, Permian shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from all of its Guarantees and related obligations in the
Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of Permian; and the signature of an Officer of Permian. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with Permian and a Subsidiary Guarantor, CPLP hereby agrees to assume all of the
obligations of Permian. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in
accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this First Supplemental
Indenture. This First Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein
and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Chesapeake
Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined
in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS FIRST
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this First Supplemental Indenture.
Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE IS SIGNATURE
PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this First Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE EP, L.L.C.</FONT></TD></TR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.10.2
<SEQUENCE>20
<FILENAME>dex4102.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 24, 2006
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Second Supplemental Indenture dated as of February 24, 2006</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 4.10.2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR
SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2018
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF FEBRUARY 24, 2006 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%"
SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of February&nbsp;24, 2006, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of June&nbsp;20, 2005, (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has
originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.25% Senior Notes due 2018 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS,
Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect: (a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary
Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Hodges Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100 Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc. as Restricted Subsidiaries of the Company and desires to add
the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions required to effect the release,
pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of Chesapeake PRH Corp. (&#147;PRH&#148;), a Texas corporation, Chesapeake ENO Acquisition, L.L.C. (&#147;ENO&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, Chesapeake EP, L.L.C.
(&#147;EP&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, John C. Oxley, L.L.C. (&#147;Oxley&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company, Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C. (&#147;CNR&#148;), a Delaware limited liability company, Columbia Energy
Resources, L.L.C. (&#147;CER&#148;), a Delaware limited liability company, Chesapeake NFW, L.P. (&#147;NFW&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership, Chesapeake Permian, L.P. (&#147;Permian&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership, Chesapeake-Staghorn
Acquisition, L.P. (&#147;Staghorn&#148;), an Oklahoma limited partnership and Chesapeake Zapata, L.P. (&#147;Zapata&#148;), an Oklahoma Limited Partnership; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company, of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to
make this Second Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and performed; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the
Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 1 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This Second Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for
any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This Second Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its execution
and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this Second Supplemental Indenture,
Hodges Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100 Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc., all Oklahoma corporations, are subject to the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in
Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata, with and into Chesapeake Exploration Limited Partnership, an Oklahoma limited partnership (&#147;CELP&#148;), which
constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata shall for all purposes be released as Subsidiary Guarantors from all of their Guarantees and related
obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the names of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata, the signature of an
Officer of each of PRH, ENO, EP and Oxley and the signature of an Officer of Chesapeake Operating, Inc. on behalf of NFW, Permian and Zapata. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and Zapata and a Subsidiary Guarantor, CELP hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of PRH, ENO, EP, Oxley, NFW, Permian, and
Zapata. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.03. </I>As a result of the merger of CNR and CER, with and into Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., an Oklahoma
limited liability company, which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, CNR and CER shall for all purposes be released as Subsidiary Guarantors from all of their Guarantees and related
obligations in the Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the names of CNR and CER, the signature of an Officer of CNR and the signature of an
Officer of CER. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.04. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with CER and CNR and a Subsidiary Guarantor, Chesapeake
Appalachia, L.L.C. hereby agrees to assume all of the obligations of CNR and CER. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.05. </I>As a result of the dissolution of Staghorn, the Company has taken all actions
required to effect the release, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture, of Staghorn as a Subsidiary Guarantor. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of Staghorn and the signature of an
Officer of Staghorn on its behalf. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in
accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this Second
Supplemental Indenture. This Second Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at
length herein and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee
that Hodges Holding Company, Inc., Hodges Oilfield Company, Hodges Trucking Company, Nomac 100 Corp. and W.W. Realty, Inc. have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined in the
Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS SECOND
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this Second Supplemental Indenture. Each
signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE IS SIGNATURE
PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Second Supplemental Indenture to be duly
executed, all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="100%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ROYALTY, L.L.C.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">GOTHIC PRODUCTION, L.L.C.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">MC MINERAL COMPANY, L.L.C.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">MAYFIELD PROCESSING, L.L.C.</FONT></P></TD></TR>

<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-4.11.1
<SEQUENCE>21
<FILENAME>dex4111.htm
<DESCRIPTION>FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 14, 2005
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>First Supplemental Indenture dated as of November 14, 2005</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXHIBIT 4.11.1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR
SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CHESAPEAKE ENERGY CORPORATION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Subsidiary Guarantors named herein </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.5% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2017
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL
INDENTURE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DATED AS OF NOVEMBER 14, 2005 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR WIDTH="17%"
SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE BANK OF NEW YORK TRUST COMPANY, N.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as Trustee </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><HR SIZE="3" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000" ALIGN="left">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE, dated as of November&nbsp;14, 2005, is among Chesapeake Energy
Corporation, an Oklahoma corporation (the <I>&#147;Company&#148;</I>), each of the parties identified under the caption &#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148; on the signature page hereto (the <I>&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;</I>) and The Bank of New
York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>RECITALS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors a party thereto and the Trustee entered into an Indenture, dated as of August&nbsp;16 2005, (the <I>&#147;Indenture&#148;</I>), pursuant to which the Company has
originally issued $600,000,000 in principal amount of 6.5% Senior Notes due 2017 (the <I>&#147;Notes&#148;</I>); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS,
Section&nbsp;9.01(3) of the Indenture provides that the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee may amend or supplement the Indenture without notice to or consent of any Holder to reflect: (a)&nbsp;the addition of any Subsidiary
Guarantor, as provided for in the Indenture, and (b)&nbsp;the release of any Subsidiary Guarantor as provided for in the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Board of Directors of the Company has designated Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. as Restricted Subsidiaries of
the Company and desires to add the entities as Subsidiary Guarantors under the Indenture; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has taken all actions
required to effect the release, pursuant to Sections 10.02 and 10.04 of the Indenture, of Chesapeake Permian Acquisition, L.L.C. (&#147;Permian&#148;), an Oklahoma limited liability company as a Subsidiary Guarantor; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, all acts and things prescribed by the Indenture, by law and by the charter and the bylaws (or comparable constituent documents) of the Company,
of the Subsidiary Guarantors and of the Trustee necessary to make this First Supplemental Indenture a valid instrument legally binding on the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee, in accordance with its terms, have been duly done and
performed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, to comply with the provisions of the Indenture and in consideration of the above premises, the Company, the
Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee covenant and agree for the equal and proportionate benefit of the respective Holders of the Notes as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.01</I>. This First Supplemental Indenture is supplemental to the Indenture and does and shall
be deemed to form a part of, and shall be construed in connection with and as part of, the Indenture for any and all purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 1 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;1.02</I>. This First Supplemental Indenture shall become effective immediately upon its
execution and delivery by each of the Company, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;2.01</I>. From this date, in accordance with Section&nbsp;10.03 of the Indenture and by executing this First Supplemental Indenture,
Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C., all Delaware limited liability companies, and Chesapeake Appalachia, L.L.C., an Oklahoma limited liability company are subject to
the provisions of the Indenture as Subsidiary Guarantors to the extent provided for in Article Ten thereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.01.</I> As a result of the merger of Permian with and into Chesapeake Permian, L.P., an Oklahoma limited partnership
(&#147;CPLP&#148;), which constitutes a merger with a Subsidiary Guarantor under Section&nbsp;10.02(a) of the Indenture, Permian shall for all purposes be released as a Subsidiary Guarantor from all of its Guarantees and related obligations in the
Indenture, pursuant to Section&nbsp;10.04 of the Indenture. The notation on the Securities relating to the Guarantee shall be deemed to exclude the name of Permian; and the signature of an Officer of Permian. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;3.02. </I>As the surviving entity in its merger with Permian and a Subsidiary Guarantor, CPLP hereby agrees to assume all of the
obligations of Permian. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.01</I>. Except as specifically modified herein, the Indenture and the Notes are in all respects ratified and confirmed (<I>mutatis mutandis</I>) and shall remain in full force and effect in
accordance with their terms with all capitalized terms used herein without definition having the same respective meanings ascribed to them as in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.02</I>. Except as otherwise expressly provided herein, no duties, responsibilities or liabilities are assumed, or shall be construed to be assumed, by the Trustee by reason of this First Supplemental
Indenture. This First Supplemental Indenture is executed and accepted by the Trustee subject to all the terms and conditions set forth in the Indenture with the same force and effect as if those terms and conditions were repeated at length herein
and made applicable to the Trustee with respect hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.03</I>. The Company hereby notifies the Trustee that Chesapeake
Appalachia, L.L.C., Columbia Natural Resources, L.L.C., Columbia Energy Resources, L.L.C., and Hawg Hauling&nbsp;&amp; Disposal, L.L.C. have been designated by the Board of Directors of the Company as Restricted Subsidiaries (as that term is defined
in the Indenture). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.04</I>. THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN AND BE USED TO CONSTRUE AND ENFORCE THIS FIRST
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Section&nbsp;4.05</I>. The parties may sign any number of copies of this First Supplemental Indenture.
Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of such executed copies together shall represent the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[NEXT PAGE IS SIGNATURE
PAGE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 - </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this First Supplemental Indenture to be duly executed,
all as of the date first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
